Constant Field Values

zoom

private float zoom

mapOrigin

android.graphics.Point mapOrigin
Origin of the map. All scaling centers on this point. This is typically the location where the aircraft icon is drawn, however it may move if the user uses the scale gesture (pinch-to-zoom).

mapAnchorLatLng

private LatLng mapAnchorLatLng
Panning changes the map anchor. May be null when not panning.

isPanning

private volatile boolean isPanning
True when the user has panned at all. Stays true across multiple touch events until panning is cancelled.

MapModel()
Method Detail

resetMapOrigin

public void resetMapOrigin(boolean isNorthUp)
Resets the map origin.

Parameters:
isNorthUp - true if the user preference is to put north at the top (false for track-up).

zoomStep

public void zoomStep(boolean zoomIn)
Zooms in or out by ZOOM_STEP

Parameters:
zoomIn - true to zoom in, false to zoom out.

setMapAnchorLatLng

public void setMapAnchorLatLng(LatLng mapAnchorLatLng)
Sets the map anchor point. Pass null to reset the anchor to the current location.
